basic.description: This elective course focuses on a developmental approach to social-intervention research. It includes articulation of conceptual intervention models and their development, piloting, implementation, and dissemination. Micro-, mezzo-, and macro-level intervention models may be included as part of the course, depending on the students' interest. Background in both theory building and research methods is required.
basic.subject: SOW
basic.title: Intervention Research in Social Work
